name: cathartic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving the release of strong emotions through a particular activity or experience: a cathartic experience I find it very cathartic to dance. See
catharsis
More examplesFewer examplesHis writing seems cathartic - a release from the sometimes tragic events of his life.A frequent staple of the short story in general is a cathartic moment.Most people can testify to the cathartic effects of hurling all their frustrations and worries into an email to a friend.There is something very cathartic about exercise.
